thread.title: BRIEF-Bookrunner Says Sale Of About 7.6 Mln Shares In WPP Plc By Means Of Accelerated Bookbuild Offering‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bookrunner Says Sale Of About 7.6 Mln Shares In WPP Plc By Means Of Accelerated Bookbuild Offering‍​

organizations.name: wpp plc by means of accelerated bookbuild offering‍​ feb

text:
Feb 20 (Reuters) - BOOKRUNNER:
* BLOCK TRADE - WPP PLC: BOOKRUNNER SAYS SALE OF ABOUT 7.6 MILLION SHARES IN WPP BY MEANS OF ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD OFFERING‍​
* BLOCK TRADE - WPP PLC: BOOKRUNNER SAYS OFFERING IS BEING UNDERTAKEN TO ADJUST MORGAN STANLEY’S HEDGE UNDER DERIVATIVE TRANSACTIONS
* BLOCK TRADE - WPP PLC: MORGAN STANLEY IS SOLE BOOKRUNNER IN ACCELERATED BOOKBUILD OFFERING Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
